ColorReliefEdit module

class ColorReliefEdit.ColorReliefEdit(app)[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

Main window for the Color Relief Editor, which manages color relief projects, settings, and GDAL makefile operations.

Attributes: - make (QProcess or None): A QProcess object that handles GDAL makefile operations. - project (ProjectData): An instance of the ProjectData class, which handles the

management of project data.

  • config (ConfigFile): An instance of the ConfigFile class, which manages configuration settings.

  • tabs (QTabWidget): A tab widget that contains the tabs for project settings, color ramps, and makefile operations.

  • current_tab (int): The index of the currently selected tab in the QTabWidget.

Methods:

closeEvent(event) → None[source]

Application close event - notify the current tab before the application exits.

Parameters:

event (QCloseEvent) – The close event that triggers the application exit.

create_default_app_config(app_path)[source]

Create default config file for app settings if none exists.

init_ui(tab_classes, app) → None[source]

The UI is a tab control with a tab per feature

load_all_tabs()[source]

Have each tab load data when a project is opened. If loading fails for any tab, update the project status, and halt further loading.

Returns:

True if tabs are loaded successfully, False if any tab fails to load.

Return type:

bool

load_app_config(name)[source]
on_tab_changed(index)[source]

Handle tab change events by notifying the old tab of exit and the new tab of enter.

Parameters:

index (int) – The index of the newly selected tab.

set_tabs_available(enable, always_enabled)[source]

Enable or disable tabs based on enable flag. Tabs in “always_enabled” are always enabled.

Parameters:

  • enable (bool) – Whether to enable or disable tabs.

  • always_enabled (list) – tabs that are always enabled.

ColorReliefEdit.expanding_vertical_spacer(height)[source]

Create a spacer that expands vertically to help align UI components.

Parameters:

height (int) – The minimum height for the spacer.

Returns:

A spacer that expands vertically

Return type:

QSpacerItem

ColorReliefEdit.main()[source]

Entry point for the application. Initializes the QApplication and shows the main window.
